attributes.additional_details: Schools should be slowly reintroduced say 2 days a week at first in school and 3 days at home and gradually building up to full time and during this time it would be easier to control the virus . It is inevitable that cases will rise reopening them full time after 6 months apart!
attributes.background: When the schools were closed in March and the children had 6 months off they were put back into school full time and now cases are rising!
